articles.description: After wearing black and white to the MET Gala, Priyanka Chopra switched to a red shirt-dress with a slit for the MET Gala after-party.
articles.content: Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas, who shelled out major couple goals at the Met Gala 2023 red carpet, left fans mesmerised with their presence at the after party of the gala event.

articles.description: AR Rahman concert row: Senior police inspector Santosh Patil who stopped the show midway after going on stage has now spoken about the incident.
